thread.title: Cleveland's Rust Belt Riders nominated for $50K food innovation award
thread.title_full: Cleveland's Rust Belt Riders nominated for $50K food innovation award

author: Nikki Delamotte, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland's Rust Belt Riders nominated for $50K food innovation award
text: Local food innovators Rust Belt Riders have been named one of 18 finalists in the international Food+City Challenge Prize People's Choice Award, which encourages ingenuity in the urban food system. The competition put them in the running to win $50,000. Votes can be cast on the Food+City Facebook page.
